title: Update Home hero typing words to include “Debugger”

requirements.summary: Update the Home page hero typing animation word list to include “Debugger” and match the exact requested order.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` defines `typingWords` with exactly 5 entries in this order: Developer, Designer, Database, Debugger, DevOps.
The Home hero headline continues to render as "Full-Stack" followed by the animated typing word, and the animation cycles through the updated list without runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing `typingWords` constant with exactly: ['Developer','Designer','Database','Debugger','DevOps'] (5 entries, in that order), without changing TypingWord behavior, animation settings, or other hero content.
